tool_description: URL to screenshot generator. Generate screenshots of websites in JPEG or PNG  You can also input various parameters such as width, height,  resolutions like mobile, desktop or tablet
name: Gridshot
title: Gridshot

api_list.name: Caputre
api_list.description:
Capture the screenshot by passing URL

Other parameters you can pass:

-  viewport_width:  [Default: 1920]
- viewport_height: [Default: 1080]
- javascriptEnabled: [Default: false]
- fullPage: [Default: true]
- width: [Default: 600]
- height: [Default: 600]
